mapper.select: select id, name from showdb where name like '%${param1}%' order by name desc;
select a.id, a.user_id, a.title, a.content, date_format(a.writedate, '%m-%d %h:%i') writedate, b.genre from board a inner join showdb b on a.showdb_id = b.id

select a.id, a.user_id, a.title, a.content, date_format(a.writedate, '%m-%d %h:%i') writedate, b.genre from board a inner join showdb b on a.showdb_id = b.id where b.genre = #{genre} order by id desc; -- select * -- from board
mapper.insert: insert into board(user_id, title, content) values (#{user_id}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.delete: delete from board where id = 1 AND board.user_id = {user_id}
